source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_00<tab>Martyn is desperately trying to take his mind off of the impending match with Siegfried.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_00<tab>Martyn a un programme précis en tête.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_01<tab>Martyn, in spite of his upcoming match with a Coliseum gladiator, has instead thrown himself into researching the applications of blue magic. He is particularly interested to know how well the spells he has mastered will keep a party of blue mages fighting fit while exploring dangerous locations, such as Copperbell Mines, which he plans to visit. A recent increase in hecatoncheir activity has made the mineral excavation site too hazardous for the workers to enter, and Martyn aims to quell the uprising, test his theories, and train P'yandih and Nutiba Buntiba, all in one fell swoop. His two young apprentices have been told to wait for you in the nearby settlement of Horizon, with the mines a short distance away.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_01<tab>Pour sa leçon du jour, Martyn veut vous emmener, Nutiba Buntiba, P'yandih et vous, chasser les hécatonchires aux Mines de Clochecuivre, une façon pour lui de prouver la polyvalence des mages bleus. Commencez par l'accompagner à Horizon, où il a donné rendez-vous à ses deux apprentis.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_02<tab>In Horizon, P'yandih explains that she has already visited Copperbell Mines on several occasions. Nutiba Buntiba, on the other hand, lacks her experience, but has made efforts to study the layout of the tunnels. Martyn, meanwhile, has next to no knowledge of the mines, having never been there himself and neglecting to gather any information beforehand. However, Nutiba's motto of “By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail,” seems to have struck a chord with him. Martyn leads the party across the plains of western Thanalan to the site of the proposed hecatoncheir hunt.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez retrouvé les élèves de Martyn en pleine forme et apparemment très bien préparés à l'épreuve qui vous attend, contrairement à leur maître... Rejoignez à présent la petite classe au complet près de l'entrée des Mines de Clochecuivre, dans le Thanalan occidental.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_03<tab>To the surprise of all, the first opponent to greet the party is not a hecatoncheir, but a winged voidsent. Martyn and his two students have already slain the beast by the time you arrive, and since you were too late to join the battle, you are nominated to search the area for a similar creature that has escaped them and poses a threat to the people of Horizon.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_03<tab>À l'entrée des mines, Martyn et ses disciples ont été attaqués par une créature du néant surgie de nulle part, qu'ils ont heureusement pu vaincre sans mal. Votre ami en aurait toutefois aperçu une autre dans les parages, et vous charge donc de partir à sa chasse. Observez les environs à l'endroit indiqué, et attendez-vous au pire.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_04<tab>You soon discover the voidsent hovering ominously a short distance from the mine, and despite its determination to rip you into bite-sized meaty chunks, it finally succumbs to your blue magic. You return to report the outcome of your battle to Martyn and the others, who are still attempting to unravel the mystery of what exactly has occurred here.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez retrouvé et abattu la créature du néant vagabonde. Retournez maintenant auprès de vos camarades.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_05<tab>Martyn comes to the realization that the voidsent are identical to those used in the Masked Carnivale, and the question as to how this could have happened is soon answered when Fyrgeiss and his son Zirnberk burst forth from the mine. They had released voidsent into the tunnels as a means of eradicating the hecatoncheires that had invaded Copperbell Mines, a task which would normally fall to the Stone Torches. Having learned of Fyrgeiss's whereabouts from his underlings, Royse arrives on the scene to berate him for taking the voidsent from the Celestium's menagerie. He responds by claiming that his recent investment gives him the right to use the creatures as he pleases. Royse emphasizes that in spite of the financial backing she has received, her position remains unchanged, sparking a vitriolic exchange between her and Fyrgeiss. Martyn interjects to suggest that rather than using voidsent, Amajina & Sons could instead hire the Blue Mages' Guild to protect their property. When this proposal is cruelly thrown back in his face, he quickly changes tack by offering a wager based on the outcome of his match with Zirnberk. In the event that he loses, control of the Celestium would pass to Fyrgeiss, and the use of voidsent as living weapons would be allowed to continue. Should Martyn win the contest, Royse would remain as owner and the Blue Mages' Guild would enter the employ of Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern. Though Royse is aghast at the idea of placing her livelihood in Martyn's less-than-reliable hands, Fyrgeiss willingly accepts, assured that his son will emerge the victor. Having said more than enough for one day, your mentor decides against making the situation any worse than it already is by retiring to Ul'dah to prepare for his highly anticipated battle.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_05<tab>À votre retour, Martyn vous a révélé que la créature qui gisait à ses pieds provenait sûrement... de la ménagerie du Ciel azur. L'instant d'après, Fyrgeiss et son fils ont émergé des Mines de Clochecuivre et ont accouru vers vous, bientôt rejoints par Royse, venue demander des comptes au président d'Amajina et Fils. Vous avez alors enfin compris ce qui se tramait<var 1D /var>: profitant de sa mainmise financière sur la Grande Mascarade, Fyrgeiss s'est permis d'en déployer les créatures du néant dans les Mines de Clochecuivre afin d'éliminer les hécatonchires. Cette initiative prise sans con<var 16 /var>sul<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion préalable n'a évidemment pas du tout plu à Royse, et les invectives ont commencé à fuser entre les deux partenaires. Martyn s'est alors interposé, et a proposé de régler leur différend par un pari des plus osés<var 1D /var>: s'il remporte son duel contre Siegfried, Fyrgeiss devra renoncer à la ménagerie du Ciel azur et employer à la place des mages bleus<var 1D /var>; dans le cas contraire, Royse sera forcée de reconnaître l'homme d'affaires comme son nouveau patron... Remettez-vous de ce rocambolesque épisode et rejoignez Martyn à Ul'dah, près du sanctuaire de Milvaneth.

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_06<tab>Back at the Blue Mages' Guild, Martyn's bravado does little to set Royse's mind at ease, and it seems that she is all but resigned to losing the Celestium. Martyn's preparations for the fight seem to extend only to asking that you be ready to stand in for him, in the not-as-unlikely-as-one-might-think event that he would be prevented from participating. Being in the habit of asking you to learn specific blue magic spells, he instructs you to master Frog Legs. Strangely enough, this is a technique for drawing the enemy's attention, which is seldom an issue in the arena, though as Martyn points out, the day may soon arrive that you have a chance to use it, should the guild ever enter the employ of Amajina & Sons.

※The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn upon reaching level 60 and learning Frog Legs.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_06<tab>Martyn a semblé plutôt confiant quant à son combat à venir. Il vous a malgré tout demandé de poursuivre vos efforts et d'apprendre un sort sup<var 16 /var>plé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>re, <var 1A 02 /var>juste au cas où<var 1A 01 /var>...
* Martyn propose la prochaine quête aux mages bleus de niveau 60 ayant appris l'action Ritournelle batracienne.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Martyn in Horizon.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Martyn, à Horizon

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Martyn.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Martyn, près des Mines de Clochecuivre

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_02<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any voidsent that appear.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_02<tab>Observer les environs à l'endroit indiqué et vaincre la créature du néant

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_100_000<tab>I appreciate your enthusiasm, but you can hardly be considered my equal if you haven't even learned Exuviation yet!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_100_000<tab>Je vois que tu t'es <var 08 E905 ((entraînée)) ((entraîné)) /var> dur. Mais tu dois encore apprendre Exuviation pour devenir <var 08 E905 ((une suppléante)) ((un suppléant)) /var> digne de ce nom<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn upon learning Exuviation.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Apprenez l'action de mage bleu <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Exuviation<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> et revenez voir Martyn pour qu'il vous propose la prochaine quête.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_000<tab>You might be wonderin' why I'd ask you to learn Exuviation of all things.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_000<tab>Aha<var 1D /var>! Tu as maîtrisé Exuviation et gagné en puissance. Voilà qui va nous faciliter la leçon d'aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_001<tab>Well, it's all part of my research into the versatility of blue mages. You can use it to heal yourself, of course, but I want to see how effective that spell is in keepin' your friends alive and kickin'.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_001<tab>Comme tu le sais, j'ai l'intention de mettre à l'épreuve la polyvalence de notre art. Autrement dit, je compte vous embarquer, mes disciples et toi, dans une expédition à haut risque.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_002<tab>In fact, I thought we'd take P'yandih and Nutiba out into the field to test a few of my theories. It'll be good trainin' for them, too. I've sent them ahead to Horizon, and from there we'll head to Copperbell Mines, where I hear hecatoncheires are causin' a spot of bother.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_002<tab>Si on en revient vivants, ça prouvera que les mages bleus peuvent jouer n'importe quel rôle au sein d'une équipe... et dans le cas contraire que je suis un très mauvais maître, mais ne parlons pas des choses qui fâchent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_003<tab>An ongoin' problem, by all accounts. Sounds like the perfect chance to show off our teamwork. Not that we've ever worked as a team before, but this seems a good place to start!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_003<tab>Concrètement, notre mission du jour consiste à nous rendre aux Mines de Clochecuivre afin de calmer des hécatonchires un peu trop excités. Nutiba et P'yandih doivent nous rejoindre à Horizon, allons-y.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_004<tab>Latool Ja not sure about this plan. Nutiba and P'yandih probably think this just a training exercise, but hecatoncheires very dangerous!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_004<tab>De la nervosité, chez le patron, je sens depuis peu. Pour son duel, sans doute s'inquiète-t-il...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_005<tab>Please, try to keep all three from harm. Maybe <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> act as healer, yes?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_005<tab>Du bien, un peu d'exercice devrait lui faire... De lui, prenez soin.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_008<tab>Martyn very irresponsible to take new recruits into hecatoncheir-infested mines. Latool Ja say even cave bats too strong for those novices.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_008<tab>Sur le patron, gardez un œil. Si vite arrivé, un accident est...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_010<tab>Where the bloody hells are they? Knowin' those two, they're probably gettin' fleeced by some swindler or another. Ahem.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_010<tab>Bah alors, de quoi vous discutiez, Latool Ja et toi<var 1D /var>? Vous ne cassiez pas du sucre sur mon dos, j'espère<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Je plaisante. Nutiba et P'yandih devraient arriver d'une minute à l'autre, attendons-les tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment ici.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_011<tab>Oh, look who it is! Finished sightseein', have we?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_011<tab>Ah, ma petite classe au complet.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_012<tab>Master <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Since last we met, my blue magic has come on leaps and bounds!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_012<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, ça faisait longtemps<var 1D /var>! J'ai travaillé mon jeu de jambes depuis la dernière fois, vous allez voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_013<tab>And thanks to our last lesson, I'm better at keeping my enemies on the back foot! Or tentacle. Well, whatever it might be.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_013<tab>Et moi, j'arrive à lancer mes sorrrts presque aussi vite que vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_014<tab>Oi! Don't go gettin' ahead of yourselves. You might have a few new spells and a bit more experience, but if you get complacent, those hecatoncheires'll be grindin' your bones before you can say “Flying Sardine”!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_014<tab>Dites donc, vous deux, c'est pas bientôt fini ces fanfaronnades<var 1D /var>? Je vous rappelle que nous allons affronter de gros dangers aujourd'hui. Gardez les pieds sur terre si vous ne voulez pas ressortir des Mines de Clochecuivre sur une civière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_015<tab>Hmph! I'm no stranger to Copperbell Mines, you know. Hecatoncheires don't scare me!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_015<tab>Tout ira bien, Maître. J'ai déjà combattu des géants par le passé et comme vous pouvez le voirrr, je suis toujours en vie.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_016<tab>As this is my first time exploring this particular location, I have been asking other adventurers for advice, checking the layout of the tunnels and so forth. “By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail,” is my motto! How about you, guildmaster?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_016<tab>Et moi, je n'ai peut-être pas l'expérience de P'yandih, mais je suis incollable sur les mines. Grâce aux ren<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments que m'ont fournis d'autres aventuriers, j'ai pu planifier notre expédition de A à Z. Et vous Maître, qu'avez-vous fait de votre côté<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_017<tab>Well, I can't say I've been there myself, but when you're as proficient in the blue arts as I am, you can sort of...play it by ear, so to speak.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_017<tab>M-moi<var 1D /var>? Euh... Eh bien... je me suis occupé... de choses et d'autres...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_018<tab>Say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you know anythin' about Copperbell Mines?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_018<tab>Hum... Et toi <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? T-tu t'es <var 08 E905 ((préparée)) ((préparé)) /var> comme il faut<var 1D /var>? Tu t'es informé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> sur notre destination<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_Q1_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_001<tab>I've been there more times than you've had hot dinners.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_001<tab>Pas la peine. Les Mines de Clochecuivre n'ont aucun secret pour moi.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_002<tab>Every nook and cranny is indelibly etched into my memory.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_002<tab>Bien évidemment.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_019<tab>Maybe I should let you take the lead, then. Ha ha! Only joking! We all know who the leader is. Blue mages, with me!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_019<tab>D-donc, je suis le seul de nous quatre à être là en touriste<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... B-bon, peu importe. En route, mauvaise troupe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_020<tab>You're pullin' my leg, ain't you? So, the only one who knows nothin' about the place...is me? Hmph! I've never been the sort to let a complete lack of prior knowledge stop me from doin' anythin' before, and I ain't about to start now. Blue mages, with me!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_020<tab>Ouf, je ne suis donc pas le seul cancre du lot... B-bon, assez tergiversé. En route, mauvaise troupe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_026<tab>I wasn't expecting to be attacked before even setting foot in the mine, let alone by a...voidsent? I assume that's what it is. Was, rather.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_026<tab>C'est... une créature du néant. Elle s'est jetée sur nous dès notre arrivée.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_027<tab>I don't know what it is, but I'm glad it's dead. Wait. Did it just twitch, or am I imagining things?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_027<tab>Faites attention, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Il y en a peut-êtrrre d'autres.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_030<tab>We were waitin' for you to show up when this bloody horrible flyin' bastard came out of nowhere! Even though it caught us off guard, it was no match for the combined might of our blue magic!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_030<tab>Purée, on a eu chaud... À peine a-t-on mis les pieds ici que cette affreuse gargouille nous est tombée dessus. Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que j'ai de bons réflexes...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_031<tab>There was another one that went flappin' off somewhere, but we're too knackered to go after it. Seein' as you missed all the fun, I'm volunteerin' you to go and look for it. And be quick about it! All hells'll break loose if that thing reaches Horizon.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_031<tab>Il me semble en avoir aperçu une autre, mais elle a filé... Pour le bien des habitants du coin, est-ce que tu pourrais t'en charger<var 1D /var>? Elle n'a pas dû aller bien loin.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_036<tab>I need you to track down and kill that voidsent before it gets away!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_036<tab>Il me semble avoir aperçu une autre gargouille, mais elle a filé... Pour le bien des habitants du coin, est-ce que tu pourrais t'en charger<var 1D /var>? Elle n'a pas dû aller bien loin.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_037<tab>Voidsent don't simply appear out of thin air. Someone or <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> must be behind this...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_037<tab>Ces créatures du néant ne devraient pas être là. À moins que...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_038<tab>It took all three of us to kill the first voidsent, and then you show up and take down one by yourself! Seems like we've got a lot to learn, including the guildmaster...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_038<tab>Vous avez eu l'autrrre, déjà<var 1D /var>? Quelle efficacité, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_040<tab>Nicely done, mate. Now that I think of it, I've seen creatures like this before. They're used in the Masked Carnivale!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ces créatures du néant... je crois savoir d'où elles viennent. J'en ai combattu des pareilles... dans la Grande Mascarade.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_041<tab>Which raises the question: what are they doin' here?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_041<tab>Ne me demande pas ce qu'elles font en plein Thanalan, je n'en ai aucune idée. Mais ce sont bien elles, il n'y a pas de doute là-dessus.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_042<tab>(-???-)They went this way! Quickly!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_042<tab>(-???-)Hé, vous là-bas<var 1D /var>! Rien de cassé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_043<tab>Fyrgeiss! And his son, Zirnfrieg...or was that Siegberk? Bah, whatever his bloody name is!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_043<tab>M-Monsieur Fyrgeiss<var 1D /var>! Et l'armoire à gl... je veux dire, Zirnberk<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_044<tab>Azuro? You and your little friends managed to slay the escaped voidsent? It seems you have spared our blushes.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_044<tab>Tiens donc, le Bleuet masqué. Tes amis et toi avez abattu les créatures du néant échappées des mines<var 1D /var>? C'est bien aimable à vous.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_045<tab>Sod all that, just tell us what's goin' on!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_045<tab>Je ne comprends pas... Qu'est-ce que vous fabriquez ici<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_046<tab>(-???-)You heard him, Fyrgeiss!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_046<tab>(-???-)Monsieur Fyrgeiss, j'attends des ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_047<tab>Royse as well? Bloody hells, they're all comin' out of the woodwork now.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_047<tab>P-Patronne<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_048<tab>I'm lucky your underlings are so loose-lipped, or I would never have tracked you down. You think you can make off with my voidsent and get away with it!? Investor or not, you've crossed the line.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_048<tab>Que vous soyez notre sponsor ne vous donne en aucun cas le droit de vous approprier nos créatures, et encore moins de les lâcher dans la nature<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_049<tab>Now, now. I simply borrowed a couple in an attempt to quell the hecatoncheir uprising taking place on Concern property.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_049<tab>Allons allons, détendez-vous. Je vous ai simplement emprunté quelques spécimens afin d'endiguer la prolifération des hécatonchires dans les Mines de Clochecuivre, qui appartiennent à ma compagnie.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_050<tab>I am sure you will be pleased to hear that your vodorigas proved to be most effective! Veritable living weapons! You see, the task seemed a waste of the Stone Torches' talents, and hiring adventurers can be awfully costly.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_050<tab>Vos créatures du néant font d'excellentes nettoyeuses, figurez-vous. Grâce à elles, je n'aurai ni à risquer la vie de mes hommes ni à louer les services de chasseurs de géants.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_051<tab>As a matter of fact, I am considering deploying voidsent elsewhere to protect my interests from roaming beasts, Amalj'aa marauders, and the like, leaving my son and his men free to return to Ul'dah, where their talents could be put to better use.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_051<tab>C'est malheureux, mais les ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions d'Amajina et Fils sont constamment exposées à des dégradations, qu'elles soient le fait de bêtes sauvages ou d'Amalj'aa. Les torches d'acier ne peuvent pas être partout à la fois, et je désespérais de trouver une solution d'appoint...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_052<tab>So that's what this is all about. It was just a ploy to get your hands on my pit fiends, wasn't it? This is a breach of our agreement!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_052<tab>C'est donc pour ça que vous avez accepté de nous parrainer<var 1D /var>!? Tsk... Pour votre gouverne, mes monstres ne sont pas des armes dont vous pouvez disposer à votre guise. Ceci est une violation pure et simple des termes de notre accord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_053<tab>Breach? With the vast amount I have invested into it, the Celestium is as good as mine.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_053<tab>Tout de suite les grands mots. Laissez-moi vous rappeler une réalité concrète<var 1D /var>: à l'heure actuelle, Amajina et Fils prend en charge plus de la moitié des coûts opérationnels du Ciel azur.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_054<tab>I have the right to run it in any way I please. Every last mammet, voidsent, and wild beast in that menagerie belongs to me now.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_054<tab>À ce titre, j'ai tout à fait mon mot à dire sur la gouvernance de votre entreprise, et notamment la façon dont vous mettez à profit votre petite ménagerie.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_055<tab>I allowed you to invest in the Celestium, not to buy it from under my nose!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_055<tab>V-vous nous donnez des sous, et alors<var 1D /var>!? Ça ne fait pas de vous le pro<var 16 /var>prié<var 16 /var>taire de la maison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_056<tab>If you think I am the sort to stand back and wait for the coin to come trickling in, you are <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> much mistaken!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_056<tab>Je suis le plus gros investisseur, c'est tout comme<var 1D /var>! De quel patelin vous débarquez pour ne pas savoir comment ça fonctionne<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_057<tab>I didn't get where I am today by letting blustering fools with more gil than sense push me around. The Celestium is mine, you hear me!?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_057<tab>Je me fiche de “comment ça fonctionne”<var 1D /var>! Le Ciel azur m'appartient à moi et à moi seule, et ce n'est pas près de changer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_058<tab>Watch your mouth, you second-rate hack!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_058<tab>Oh que si que ça va changer<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment pas une femme d'affaires de seconde zone qui va me dicter sa loi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_059<tab>Oh, is that so? Maybe I should ask your friends at the Syndicate who <var 1A 02 /var>they<var 1A 01 /var> think is second-rate?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_059<tab>D-de seconde zone<var 1D /var>!? C'est le type qui n'a plus aucun poids au sein du Cartel des Scorpions qui ose me dire ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_060<tab>I'll drive you out of Ul'dah─nay, Eorzea! Everything you own will be mine! Mine!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_060<tab>Vous êtes licenciééée<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_061<tab>Might I make a suggestion? If you're looking for a substitute for the Stone Torches, perhaps the Blue Mages' Guild is a more...manageable alternative to rampaging beasts.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_061<tab>P-pardon, si je puis me permettre une suggestion... Pourquoi vous servir de créatures dangereuses et im<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>vi<var 16 /var>si<var 16 /var>bles pour défendre vos murs, quand vous pouvez faire appel à de sympathiques mages bleus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_062<tab>Each of our mages comes fully equipped with a comprehensive selection of offensive, defensive, and healing spells, perfect for every occasion.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_062<tab>Le saviez-vous<var 1D /var>? Grâce à son arsenal de sorts variés, le mage bleu est tout à la fois un combattant, un protecteur et un soigneur. Éliminer des monstres, défendre un lieu, s'occuper de blessés... Tout ça, il sait faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_063<tab>Every occasion? Come now, we all know that he who embraces too much has a weak grasp. I have no need of pathetic jesters in silly costumes.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_063<tab>Dommage que touche-à-tout rime souvent avec bon à rien... Désolé, mais je ne crois pas une seconde à tes promesses mirobolantes.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_064<tab>Oi, watch it, grandad! We'll see who's pathetic when I put your boy on his arse!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_064<tab>Vous serez forcé d'y croire une fois que j'aurai flanqué à votre fils la raclée de sa vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_065<tab>In fact, it seems to me that we could settle this whole dispute with a friendly wager.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_065<tab>Tenez, vous savez quoi<var 1D /var>? On n'a qu'à prendre les paris<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_066<tab>If I lose, the Celestium goes to you, includin' the whole menagerie. You can use all of those voidsent, along with the rest of the pit fiends, however you like.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_066<tab>Si je perds mon duel contre Siegfried, le Ciel azur et toute sa ménagerie seront à vous. Vous pourrez vous en servir pour protéger vos usines, nettoyer vos tunnels et que sais-je encore.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_067<tab>But if I win, the Celestium stays with Royse. You'll give up any thought of usin' voidsent and employ the Blue Mages' Guild to defend your property instead.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_067<tab>Par contre, si je gagne, vous devrez laisser les monstres de la patronne tranquilles, et engager des mages bleus pour assister vos torches d'acier. Ça vous va<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_068<tab>You bloody idiot! What do you think you're doing!?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_068<tab>M-Martyn<var 1D /var>! Tu as perdu la tête<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_069<tab>You have spirit, I'll give you that. Very well, I accept.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_069<tab>Très bien, puisque tu le prends comme ça... Cochon qui s'en dédit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_070<tab>I cannot decide which I am looking forward to most; adding the Celestium to my family's ever-growing collection of businesses, or utterly humiliating you in front of your beloved audience. I will see you in the arena, clown.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_070<tab>Notre combat s'annonce très intéressant. Tant mieux, je commence à en avoir assez de simplement jouer les bêtes de foire.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_071<tab>Now that's settled, we might as well get goin'. Thanks to the voidsent, it looks like we won't be huntin' hecatoncheires after all.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_071<tab>Vu que Fyrgeiss nous a malheureusement coupé l'herbe sous le pied, on va devoir remettre notre petite expédition à plus tard.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_072<tab>Nutiba, P'yandih, I don't think I'll be able to give any more lessons until after my match, so perhaps you should go and learn some new spells or somethin'. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I will head back to the guild.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_072<tab>Nutiba, P'yandih, je vous laisse vous entraîner seuls pour aujourd'hui. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, rentrons à Ul'dah, toi et moi.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_076<tab>That blue-garbed friend of yours certainly has a big mouth when it suits him. His little outburst will cost Royse dearly, you mark my words.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_076<tab>Héhé... Ne vous déplaise à tes amis et toi, le Ciel azur va bientôt changer de main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_077<tab>You must be Azuro the Second, yes? I daresay you are a lot more capable than that cretin you insist on following around.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_077<tab>C'est donc toi, le Bleuet masqué deuxième du nom. Ce n'est peut-être qu'une impression, mais tu m'as l'air bien plus redoutable que ton ami...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_078<tab><sigh> I can't believe this...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_078<tab>(soupire) J'aurais dû me douter que ça finirait comme ça...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_079<tab>Latool Ja hear what happened. No wonder Royse look so distraught.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_079<tab>Aussi dépitée, madame Royse, j'ai rarement vu...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_080<tab>Ha! Nothin' like raisin' the stakes to make a fight more interestin', wouldn't you say?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_080<tab>Et bien voilà. Cette fois, je n'ai <var 1A 02 /var>vraiment<var 1A 01 /var> plus d'autre choix que de battre Siegfried.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_081<tab>As much as the very idea of it brings bile to the back of my mouth, the future of the Celestium is in your hands, Martyn. If you lose to Siegfried, I'll throw you to the behemoths!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_081<tab>C'est l'avenir du Ciel azur qui est en jeu, alors t'as intérêt à assurer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_082<tab>Fear not! I, the Great Azuro, swear to defend your arena with my very life!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_082<tab>Bien compris, M'dame<var 1D /var>! La victoire sinon rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_083<tab>Like I have a bloody choice... This is another fine mess I've talked myself into. Anyway, like I said before, I'll need you to be ready to stand in for me, on the off chance I eat some dodgy dragon peppers or somethin' and am “unavoidably detained,” if you catch my meanin'.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_083<tab>Si tout se passe bien, ton rôle à toi se résumera à t'asseoir confortablement dans les gradins et à profiter du spectacle. <var 1A 02 /var>Si tout se passe bien...<var 1A 01 /var>

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_084<tab>Oh, and there's one more spell I want you to learn. It's called Frog Legs, and while it might not be all that useful in the arena, you'll be able to put it to use once we're gettin' paid to protect Amajina & Sons' mines.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_084<tab>Mais vu qu'on n'est jamais trop prudent, j'aimerais que tu continues de t'entraîner malgré tout. Et aussi que tu apprennes le sort Ritournelle batracienne.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_085<tab>As Azuro the Second, I'm expectin' great things from you. Now go, make your guildmaster proud!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_085<tab>Toi et moi, soyons prêts à défendre le nom du Bleuet masqué<var 1D /var>!
